Self.Wiki: Defines various effects that can be applied to the player and to enemies.\nCan define passive, activated, single-use and repeated or continuous application effects with indefinite duration.\nSuccessful application may depend on spCategory or invocationConditions.

iconId.Wiki: Icon ID (When -1, no icon is required)

conditionHp.Wiki: Set what percentage of maxHP the remaining HP will be activated

effectEndurance.Wiki: Change duration / -1 for permanent / 0 for one moment only

motionInterval.Wiki: Set how many seconds it occurs

slashDamageCutRate.Wiki: Slash damage ratio: Correct the calculated damage by XX times. 1 is normal.

blowDamageCutRate.Wiki: Batter damage ratio: The calculated damage is corrected by XX times. 1 is normal.

thrustDamageCutRate.Wiki: Puncture damage ratio: Correct the calculated damage by XX times. 1 is normal.

neutralDamageCutRate.Wiki: Non-attribute damage ratio: Correct the calculated damage by XX times. 1 is normal.

magicDamageCutRate.Wiki: Magic damage multiplier: The calculated damage is corrected by XX times. 1 is normal.

fireDamageCutRate.Wiki: Flame damage ratio: Correct the calculated damage by XX times. 1 is normal.

thunderDamageCutRate.Wiki: Electric shock damage ratio: Correct the calculated damage by XX times. 1 is normal.

physicsAttackRate.Wiki: Physical damage ratio: Correct the calculated damage by XX times. 1 is normal.

magicAttackRate.Wiki: Magic damage multiplier: The calculated damage is corrected by XX times. 1 is normal.

fireAttackRate.Wiki: Flame damage ratio: Correct the calculated damage by XX times. 1 is normal.

thunderAttackRate.Wiki: Electric shock damage ratio: Correct the calculated damage by XX times. 1 is normal.

physicsAttackPowerRate.Wiki: Multiply the physical attack power by the set value

magicAttackPowerRate.Wiki: Multiply the magic attack power by the set value

fireAttackPowerRate.Wiki: Multiply the fire attack power by the set value

thunderAttackPowerRate.Wiki: Multiply the electric shock attack power by the set value

physicsAttackPower.Wiki: Add or subtract the value set for physical attack power

magicAttackPower.Wiki: Add or subtract the value set for the magic attack power

fireAttackPower.Wiki: Add or subtract the value set for the flame attack power

thunderAttackPower.Wiki: Add or subtract the value set for the electric shock attack power

physicsDiffenceRate.Wiki: Multiply the set value for physical defense

magicDiffenceRate.Wiki: Multiply the value set for magic defense

fireDiffenceRate.Wiki: Multiply the fire defense by the set value

thunderDiffenceRate.Wiki: Multiply the value set for the electric shock defense

physicsDiffence.Wiki: Add or subtract the value set for physical defense

magicDiffence.Wiki: Add or subtract the value set for magic defense

fireDiffence.Wiki: Add or subtract the value set for the fire defense

thunderDiffence.Wiki: Add or subtract the value set for the electric shock defense

NoGuardDamageRate.Wiki: Replace the damage ratio at the time of the gap with the set value (set on the damage side)

vitalSpotChangeRate.Wiki: Replaces the damage calculation of the sweet spot with the specified value (key point damage correction) -Invalid at 1.0

lookAtTargetPosOffset.Wiki: Offset the target position when the enemy looks at. Set to crouch or mount on the side to be seen

behaviorId.Wiki:
Specified -1 when dealing damage using action ID from special effects
NPC Behavior - Requires State Info 142
Player Behavior - Requires State Info 275
Bullet Behavior - Requires State Info 33

changeHpRate.Wiki: Set what percentage of the maximum HP to subtract (or add) with one activation

changeHpPoint.Wiki: Set how many points to subtract (or add) with one activation

changeMpRate.Wiki: Set what percentage of the maximum MP to subtract (or add) with one activation

changeMpPoint.Wiki: Set how many points to subtract (or add) with one activation

mpRecoverChangeSpeed.Wiki: Change the recovery speed. Add or subtract to the standard recovery speed and initial recovery speed of the recovery formula.

changeStaminaRate.Wiki: Set what percentage of the maximum stamina to subtract (or add) with one activation

changeStaminaPoint.Wiki: Set how many points to subtract (or add) with one activation

staminaRecoverChangeSpeed.Wiki: Change the recovery speed. Add or subtract to the standard recovery speed and initial recovery speed of the recovery formula.

magicEffectTimeChange.Wiki: Add / subtract the time set for the effect duration only for magic that has the effect duration set to 0.1 seconds or more.

maxDurability.Wiki: Add the set value to the maximum value of the internal wear degree of durability.

staminaAttackRate.Wiki: Multiply the stamina attack power by a factor (1.0 1 times 0.5 half)

poizonAttackPower.Wiki: A value to be added to the target's [poison resistance value] when it hits\nRequires State Info 2

diseaseAttackPower.Wiki: Numerical value to be added to the target [Plague resistance value] when hit\nRequires State Info 5

bloodAttackPower.Wiki: A value to be added to the target's [bleeding resistance value] when it hits\nRequires State Info 6

curseAttackPower.Wiki: A number to be added to the target [curse resistance value] when hit\nRequires State Info 116

fallDamageRate.Wiki: Multiply the damage calculation when falling

soulRate.Wiki: The amount of soul acquired when defeating an enemy is added by the specified multiple.\nRequires State Info 76

equipWeightChangeRate.Wiki: Multiply the maximum equipment weight by the set magnification

allItemWeightChangeRate.Wiki: Multiply the maximum weight you have by the set magnification

soul.Wiki: Add the set value to the possessed soul

haveSoulRate.Wiki: For enemy lap effect. It is applied when the soul goes out from the set character.

targetPriority.Wiki: Chance for an enemy to switch aggro targets to/away the effect's owner. Values range from -1 to 1. +1 = 100% chance to target owner instead of current target, -1 = 100% chance to target somebody else instead of current target (effect owner).

sightSearchEnemyRate.Wiki: Correct the ease of finding by a magnification

hearingSearchEnemyRate.Wiki: Correct the loudness of the AI sound emitted by the magnification

registPoizonChangeRate.Wiki: Multiply the poison resistance value by the set multiplier

registDiseaseChangeRate.Wiki: Multiply the plague resistance value by the set magnification

registBloodChangeRate.Wiki: Multiply the bleeding resistance value by the set magnification

registCurseChangeRate.Wiki: Multiply the spell resistance value by the set multiplier

secondaryIconId.Wiki: Icon ID (When -1, no icon is required)

hpRecoverRate.Wiki: It doesn't work when HP decreases.

replaceSpEffectId.Wiki: Special effect ID added at the end of life (-1 is ignored)

cycleOccurrenceSpEffectId.Wiki: Special effect ID that occurs in each activation cycle (-1 is ignored)

atkOccurrenceSpEffectId.Wiki: Special effect ID that occurs when hitting an attack (-1 is ignored)

guardDefFlickPowerRate.Wiki: Repellent defense correction value when guarding

guardStaminaCutRate.Wiki: Stamina cut rate correction value when guarding

rayCastPassedTime.Wiki: Passing the line of sight: Activation time [ms] (for evil eye)

bowDistRate.Wiki: Correction value added to the flight distance correction of the weapon

spCategory.Wiki: Categories that determine behavior such as overwriting special effects

categoryPriority.Wiki: Priority within the same category (lower one has priority)

changeMagicSlot.Wiki: You can increase the specified number of magic registration slots

changeMiracleSlot.Wiki: You can increase the specified number of trajectory registration frames.

heroPointDamage.Wiki: Damage value given to human nature value

defFlickPower.Wiki: Set a value that overwrites the repelling defense

flickDamageCutRate.Wiki: Set a value that overwrites the damage attenuation rate at the time of repelling

bloodDamageRate.Wiki: Point damage of state change type [bleeding], correction value used only when% damage

dmgLv_None.Wiki: Specify the type to replace the damage Lv0

dmgLv_S.Wiki: Specify the type to replace the damage Lv1

dmgLv_M.Wiki: Specify the type to replace the damage Lv2

dmgLv_L.Wiki: Specify the type to replace the damage Lv3

dmgLv_BlowM.Wiki: Specify the type to replace the damage Lv4

dmgLv_Push.Wiki: Specify the type to replace the damage Lv5

dmgLv_Strike.Wiki: Specify the type to replace the damage Lv6

dmgLv_BlowS.Wiki: Specify the type to replace the damage Lv7

dmgLv_Min.Wiki: Specify the type to replace the damage Lv8

dmgLv_Uppercut.Wiki: Specify the type to replace the damage Lv9

dmgLv_BlowLL.Wiki: Specify the type to replace the damage Lv10

dmgLv_Breath.Wiki: Specify the type to replace the damage Lv11

atkAttribute.Wiki: Physical attributes to set for special effects

spAttribute.Wiki: Special attributes to set for special effects

wepParamChange.Wiki: Specify which weapon is effective. If there is no limit, all attacks and defenses including enemies are targeted

moveType.Wiki: Movement type. Change the movement speed.

throwCondition.Wiki: Throwing conditions. Affects the throwing mask.

addBehaviorJudgeId_condition.Wiki: Condition value to add a value to the action judgment ID (Def: -1)

freezeDamageRate.Wiki: Correction value used only for point damage and% damage of state change type [cold air]

effectTargetSelf.Wiki: Only the target for which this judgment is checked is effective, the default is

effectTargetFriend.Wiki: Only the target for which this judgment is checked is effective, the default is

effectTargetEnemy.Wiki: Only the target for which this judgment is checked is effective, the default is

effectTargetPlayer.Wiki: Only the target for which this judgment is checked is effective, the default is

effectTargetAI.Wiki: Only the target for which this judgment is checked is effective, the default is

effectTargetLive.Wiki: Only the target for which this judgment is checked is effective, the default is

effectTargetGhost.Wiki: Only the target for which this judgment is checked is effective, the default is

disableSleep.Wiki: If this effect is applied, you will not sleep

disableMadness.Wiki: With this effect, you won't go mad

effectTargetAttacker.Wiki: Apply special effects to attackers after damage (cannot enter defenders)

dispIconNonactive.Wiki: The icon is displayed even in the state of waiting for activation.

regainGaugeDamage.Wiki: Whether to generate a regain gauge

bAdjustMagicAblity.Wiki: Do you want to correct the magic power?

bGameClearBonus.Wiki: Whether it is for the game clear lap bonus.

magParamChange.Wiki: Set whether or not it is effective against magic

miracleParamChange.Wiki: Set whether or not it is effective against miracles

requestSOS.Wiki: If checked, issue an SOS sign request when activated

requestBlackSOS.Wiki: If checked, issue a black SOS sign request when activated

requestForceJoinBlackSOS.Wiki: If checked, issue an intrusion_A request when activated

requestKickSession.Wiki: If checked, a kick request will be issued at the time of activation.

requestLeaveSession.Wiki: If checked, an exit request will be issued at the time of activation.

requestNpcInveda.Wiki: If checked, an intrusion request to the NPC will be issued at the time of activation.

noDead.Wiki: Whether you can be corpse. With this check, you will not be dead

bCurrHPIndependeMaxHP.Wiki: Does HP now affect even if the maximum HP increases or decreases?

corrosionIgnore.Wiki: [State change type] ignores [Durability] decrease due to [Corrosion]

antiMagicIgnore.Wiki: You can use magic even in the anti-magic range

fakeTargetIgnore.Wiki: Don't get caught in the fake target that occurred

fakeTargetIgnoreUndead.Wiki: You will not be caught by the fake target of the human system that occurred

fakeTargetIgnoreAnimal.Wiki: You will not be caught by the fake target of the beast system that occurred

disablePoison.Wiki: If this effect is applied, it will not be poisoned.

disableDisease.Wiki: If this effect is applied, you will not get plague

disableBlood.Wiki: With this effect, you won't get bleeding

disableCurse.Wiki: With this effect, you won't be cursed

enableCharm.Wiki: If this effect is applied, you will be fascinated.

enableLifeTime.Wiki: Will the life be extended when the flag is set by TAE?

bAdjustStrengthAblity.Wiki: Do you want to correct your strength?

bAdjustAgilityAblity.Wiki: Do you want to correct your workmanship?

eraseOnBonfireRecover.Wiki: Will it be extinguished by bonfire recovery?

throwAttackParamChange.Wiki: Set whether or not it is effective against throwing attacks

requestLeaveColiseumSession.Wiki: If checked, a request to leave the arena will be issued at the time of activation.

isExtendSpEffectLife.Wiki: Whether to be eligible for extension when the life extension effect is applied

hasTarget.Wiki: Do you know the enemy? : [Activation condition] (for evil eye users)

replanningOnFire.Wiki: Whether to replan at the time of activation

repAtkDmgLv.Wiki: The damage level of the attacking side changes to this value

sightSearchRate.Wiki: Correct the ease of finding with a magnification

effectTargetOpposeTarget.Wiki: Only the target for which this judgment is checked is effective, the default is

effectTargetFriendlyTarget.Wiki: Only the target for which this judgment is checked is effective, the default is

effectTargetSelfTarget.Wiki: Only the target for which this judgment is checked is effective, the default is

effectTargetPcHorse.Wiki: Only the target for which this judgment is checked is effective, the default is

effectTargetPcDeceased.Wiki: Only the target for which this judgment is checked is effective, the default is

isContractSpEffectLife.Wiki: Whether it will be shortened when the life shortening effect is applied

isWaitModeDelete.Wiki: Do you want to delete it the moment you are in a waiting state?

isIgnoreNoDamage.Wiki: Whether to apply the damage from this special effect even in the invincible state only when the state change type Apply the activation function even when invincible is applied.

changeTeamType.Wiki: Overwrites the specified team type. Requires State Info 132

dmypolyId.Wiki: Damipoli ID. Damipoli ID range is 0 to 999.1000, 10000 is the category number.

accumuOverFireId.Wiki: Special effect Id activated at the upper limit of the spirit ball

accumuUnderFireId.Wiki: Special effect Id activated at the lower limit of the spirit ball

eye_angX.Wiki: Override the findability angle x. Requires State Info 267

eye_angY.Wiki: Override the findability angle y. Requires State Info 267

addDeceasedLv.Wiki: Add this value to the degree of death

freezeAttackPower.Wiki: Numerical value to be added to the target [Cold air resistance value] when hit. Requires State Info 260

AppearAiSoundId.Wiki: Generates AI sound parameters with set values

addFootEffectSfxId.AltName: Automatic Foot Effect - SFX ID Offset
addFootEffectSfxId.Wiki: The identifier of the foot effect that is additionally generated during special effects. XYYZZZ ZZZ

dexterityCancelSystemOnlyAddDexterity.Wiki: Add this value when calculating the end timing of the TAE flag of Skill Cancel.

teamOffenseEffectivity.Wiki: Overwrite and change the target [Team Attack Influence] value. Do not change the default value (-1).

weakDmgRateA.Wiki: Special Attack A Damage multiplier is corrected. 1 is normal.

weakDmgRateB.Wiki: Special attack B Damage multiplier is corrected. 1 is normal.

weakDmgRateC.Wiki: Special attack C Damage multiplier is corrected. 1 is normal.

weakDmgRateD.Wiki: Special attack D Damage multiplier is corrected. 1 is normal.

weakDmgRateE.Wiki: Special attack E Damage multiplier is corrected. 1 is normal.

weakDmgRateF.Wiki: Special attack F Damage multiplier is corrected. 1 is normal.

darkDamageCutRate.Wiki: Dark damage multiplier: Correct the calculated damage by XX times. 1 is normal.

darkDiffenceRate.Wiki: Multiply the darkness defense by the set value

quaternaryIconId.Wiki: Icon ID (When -1, no icon is required)

darkAttackRate.Wiki: Dark damage multiplier: Correct the calculated damage by XX times. 1 is normal.

darkAttackPowerRate.Wiki: Multiply the dark attack power by the set value

darkAttackPower.Wiki: Add or subtract the value set for the dark attack power

conditionHpRate.Wiki: Activates only when you have HP above the specified value

consumeStaminaRate.Wiki: Multiply by multiplying the consumption stamina value of the behavior parameter

itemDropRate.Wiki: The set value is added to [Item Drop Correction]. Requires State Info 66

changePoisonResistPoint.Wiki: Increase or decrease the state resistance value

changeDiseaseResistPoint.Wiki: Increase or decrease the state resistance value

changeBloodResistPoint.Wiki: Increase or decrease the state resistance value

changeCurseResistPoint.Wiki: Increase or decrease the state resistance value

changeFreezeResistPoint.Wiki: Increase or decrease the state resistance value

slashAttackRate.Wiki: Slash damage ratio: Correct the calculated damage by XX times. 1 is normal.

blowAttackRate.Wiki: Batter damage ratio: The calculated damage is corrected by XX times. 1 is normal.

thrustAttackRate.Wiki: Puncture damage ratio: Correct the calculated damage by XX times. 1 is normal.

neutralAttackRate.Wiki: Non-attribute damage ratio: Correct the calculated damage by XX times. 1 is normal.

slashAttackPowerRate.Wiki: Multiply the slashing attack power by the set value

blowAttackPowerRate.Wiki: Multiply the hit attack power by the set value

thrustAttackPowerRate.Wiki: Multiply the piercing attack power by the set value

neutralAttackPowerRate.Wiki: Multiply the non-attribute attack power by the set value

slashAttackPower.Wiki: Add or subtract the value set for the slashing attack power

blowAttackPower.Wiki: Add or subtract the value set for the batter attack power

thrustAttackPower.Wiki: Add or subtract the value set for the piercing attack power

neutralAttackPower.Wiki: Add or subtract the value set for non-attribute attack power

changeStrengthPoint.Wiki: Add or subtract the correction value of the weapon

changeAgilityPoint.Wiki: Add or subtract the correction value of the weapon

changeMagicPoint.Wiki: Add or subtract the correction value of the weapon

changeFaithPoint.Wiki: Add or subtract the correction value of the weapon

changeLuckPoint.Wiki: Add or subtract the correction value of the weapon

subSa.Wiki: A temporary poise durability value that is generated within a specific time window.

subSaBonusMax.Wiki: The maximum amount of extra temporary poise damage this enemy receives from the temporary poise bonus rate adjustments.

subSaBonusRate_Magic.Wiki: The amount of extra temporary poise damage an attack deals if it is of this type against this enemy.

subSaBonusRate_Fire.Wiki: The amount of extra temporary poise damage an attack deals if it is of this type against this enemy.

subSaBonusRate_Lightning.Wiki: The amount of extra temporary poise damage an attack deals if it is of this type against this enemy.

subSaBonusRate_Holy.Wiki: The amount of extra temporary poise damage an attack deals if it is of this type against this enemy.

madnessDamageRate.Wiki: Correction value used only for point damage and% damage of state change type [madness]

tertiaryIconId.Wiki: Icon ID (When -1, no icon is required)

isUseStatusAilmentAtkPowerCorrect.AltName: Use Status Ailment Attack Power Correction
isUseStatusAilmentAtkPowerCorrect.Wiki: If , the abnormal state attack power multiplier correction of the attack para is applied.

isUseAtkParamAtkPowerCorrect.Wiki: If , the attack power multiplier correction of the attack para is applied.

dontDeleteOnDead.Wiki: If it is , it will not be deleted even if the character dies. Mainly used for death effects.

disableFreeze.Wiki: When this effect is applied, it will not be cold

isDisableNetSync.Wiki: Do not synchronize with the net. It does not mean that you will be able to call it locally, but simply do not send it online. For example, a remote character does not activate locally, so nothing happens in that case.

shamanParamChange.Wiki: Set whether or not it is effective against spells

isStopSearchedNotify.Wiki: Whether to stop notifications targeting your army (used by EventMaker decisions and buddy platoons)

isCheckAboveShadowTest.Wiki: If it is , it will not be applied when it is judged to be shielded ( is always applied)

addBehaviorJudgeId_add.AltName: Add Behavior Judgment ID - Addition Value
addBehaviorJudgeId_add.Wiki: If the addition value of the action judgment ID is 0, the action is not switched and the action is stopped.

changeGuardAngle.Wiki: The new guard angle to apply when guarding weapons.

wepTypeTrigger.Wiki: Trigger this SpEffect when this weapon type is present.

wepTypeTriggerCount.Wiki: The amount of weapons of the above type that need to be present for the effect to trigger.

startingItemAmount.Wiki: The starting item amount given at the start of an expedition.

enemyStateInfoTrigger.Wiki: Trigger this effect when this state info is present on an enemy.

startGoodsId.Wiki: The goods to award to the player upon expedition start.

startSwordArtsId.Wiki: The sword arts to apply to the player's primary armament upon expedition start.

defPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Physics.Wiki: Damage correction for the damage value received from the player.

defPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Magic.Wiki: Damage correction for the damage value received from the player.

defPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Fire.Wiki: Damage correction for the damage value received from the player.

defPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Thunder.Wiki: Damage correction for the damage value received from the player.

defPlayerDmgCorrectRate_Dark.Wiki: Damage correction for the damage value received from the player.

defEnemyDmgCorrectRate_Physics.Wiki: Damage correction for the damage value received from the enemy.

defEnemyDmgCorrectRate_Magic.Wiki: Damage correction for the damage value received from the enemy.

defEnemyDmgCorrectRate_Fire.Wiki: Damage correction for the damage value received from the enemy.

defEnemyDmgCorrectRate_Thunder.Wiki: Damage correction for the damage value received from the enemy.

defEnemyDmgCorrectRate_Dark.Wiki: Damage correction for the damage value received from the enemy.

defObjDmgCorrectRate.Wiki: Damage correction for the damage value received from OBJ.

subSaBonusRate_Poison.Wiki: The amount of extra temporary poise damage an attack deals if it is of this type against this enemy.

subSaBonusRate_ScarletRot.Wiki: The amount of extra temporary poise damage an attack deals if it is of this type against this enemy.

subSaBonusRate_Bleed.Wiki: The amount of extra temporary poise damage an attack deals if it is of this type against this enemy.

subSaBonusRate_Blight.Wiki: The amount of extra temporary poise damage an attack deals if it is of this type against this enemy.

subSaBonusRate_Frostbite.Wiki: The amount of extra temporary poise damage an attack deals if it is of this type against this enemy.

subSaBonusRate_Sleep.Wiki: The amount of extra temporary poise damage an attack deals if it is of this type against this enemy.

subSaBonusRate_Madness.Wiki: The amount of extra temporary poise damage an attack deals if it is of this type against this enemy.

spEffectTextId_2.Wiki: The SpEffect text ID to use.

spEffectTextId_3.Wiki: The SpEffect text ID to use.

spEffectTextId_4.Wiki: The SpEffect text ID to use.

registFreezeChangeRate.Wiki: Multiply the cold resistance value by the set magnification

hearingAiSoundLevel.Wiki: Overwrite how good your ears are

chrProxyHeightRate.Wiki: Magnification over the height of the character capsule

addAwarePointCorrectValue_forTarget.Wiki: Searching degree addition correction _ side to be seen

sightSearchEnemyAdd.Wiki: Correct the ease of finding with a real number

sightSearchAdd.Wiki: Correct the ease of finding with a real number

hearingSearchAdd.Wiki: Correct the hearing of AI sounds with real numbers

hearingSearchRate.Wiki: Correct the audibility of AI sound by magnification

hearingSearchEnemyAdd.Wiki: Correct the loudness of the emitted AI sound with a real number

changeHpEstusFlaskRate.Wiki: Set what percentage of the maximum HP to add (or subtract) with one activation

changeHpEstusFlaskPoint.Wiki: Set how many points to add (or subtract) with one activation

changeMpEstusFlaskRate.Wiki: Set what percentage of the maximum MP to add (or subtract) with one activation

changeMpEstusFlaskPoint.Wiki: Set how many points to add (or subtract) with one activation

changeHpEstusFlaskCorrectRate.Wiki: Correct the damage amount of the HP Est bottle

changeMpEstusFlaskCorrectRate.Wiki: Correct the damage amount of MP Est Bottle

applyIdOnGetSoul.Wiki: When the special effect of the state change type HP drain is enabled, when the enemy is defeated, the special effect ID set in the HP drain activation special effect of the same special effect is called (0: ignore).

extendLifeRate.Wiki: Extension coefficient of state change type life extension

contractLifeRate.Wiki: Shortening coefficient of state change type life shortening

defObjectAttackPowerRate.Wiki: Corrects the attack power against the damage received from OBJ. (Not damage compensation)

effectEndDeleteDecalGroupId.Wiki: When the special effect disappears (lifetime / overwritten / erased ... etc.), the paint decal is deleted if the special effect of the same group ID is not applied.

deleteCriteriaDamage.Wiki: Reason for damage under the condition to remove special effects

spAttributeVariationValue.Wiki: This value is used to give variation to abnormal state SFX, SE, etc. in combination with the special attribute set for the special effect. SEQ16473

atkFlickPower.Wiki: Set a value that overwrites the repelling attack power

wetConditionDepth.Wiki: TimeAct Determines whether special effects are applied in combination with at what water level you get wet

changeSaRecoveryVelocity.Wiki: Change the recovery speed of SA durability

sleepAttackPower.Wiki: Numerical value to be added to the target's [Sleep tolerance] when hit

madnessAttackPower.Wiki: A number to be added to the target's [madness resistance value] when it hits

registSleepChangeRate.Wiki: Multiply the sleep tolerance value by the set magnification

registMadnessChangeRate.Wiki: Multiply the madness resistance value by the set multiplier

changeSleepResistPoint.Wiki: Increase or decrease the state resistance value

changeMadnessResistPoint.Wiki: Increase or decrease the state resistance value

sleepDamageRate.Wiki: Point damage of state change type [Sleep], correction value used only when% damage

applyPartsGroup.Wiki: The effect is limited by the part where the attack hits. Only defensive items in damage calculation are subject to restriction

clearTarget.Wiki: Does not recognize the target while the special effect is applied (excluding the riding target)

fakeTargetIgnoreAjin.Wiki: You will not be caught by the fake target of the subhuman system that occurred

fakeTargetIgnoreMirageArts.Wiki: You will not be caught by the fake target of the phantom arts system that occurred

requestForceJoinBlackSOS_B.Wiki: If checked, issue an intrusion_B request when activated

isDestinedDeathHpMult.Wiki: Makes portion of HP bar in UI black when used with max HP multipliers.

isHpBurnEffect.Wiki: Determines whether this effect applies Destined Death/Black Flame HP Burn.

isPeriodicEffect.Wiki: Appears to related to the periodic spawning of orb attacks.

displayIconForPermamentEffect.Wiki: If on, permanent effects (such as from talismans or passives) will appear under the health bars.

changeSuperArmorPoint.Wiki: Value to add to the super armor value

changeSaPoint.Wiki: Set how many points to subtract (or add) with one activation

poisonDefDamageRate.Wiki: Poison resistance damage ratio: Correct the calculated damage by XX times. 1 is normal.

diseaseDefDamageRate.Wiki: Epidemic resistance damage ratio: Correct the calculated damage by XX times. 1 is normal.

bloodDefDamageRate.Wiki: Bleeding resistance damage ratio: Correct the calculated damage by XX times. 1 is normal.

curseDefDamageRate.Wiki: Curse resistance damage multiplier: Corrects the calculated damage by XX times. 1 is normal.

freezeDefDamageRate.Wiki: Cold resistance damage ratio: Correct the calculated damage by XX times. 1 is normal.

sleepDefDamageRate.Wiki: Sleep resistance damage ratio: Correct the calculated damage by XX times. 1 is normal.

madnessDefDamageRate.Wiki: Madness resistance damage multiplier: Correct the calculated damage by XX times. 1 is normal.

overwrite_maxBackhomeDist.Wiki: Distance to go home no matter what [m] _ overwrite

overwrite_backhomeDist.Wiki: Distance to return home while fighting [m] _ Overwrite

overwrite_backhomeBattleDist.Wiki: Distance to give up and fight to return to the nest [m] _ overwrite

overwrite_BackHome_LookTargetDist.Wiki: When returning home: Distance to see the target [m] _ Overwrite

guardStaminaMult.Wiki: Multiplies stamina lost when blocking an attack

ultimateArtGaugeRate.Wiki: Correction value for the ultimate art gauge's base combat state recovery.

characterSkillCooldownReduction.Wiki: The amount of cooldown correction to apply to character skills.

ultimateArtGauge.Wiki: The amount of ultimate art gauge to add.

ultimateArtGaugeRecovery.Wiki: The amount of ultimate art gauge's time-based recovery to add.

ultimateArtDuration.Wiki: The amount of duration increase to apply to the character's ultimate art.

playerHandValue.Wiki: Related to the player hand: 0 is both?, 1 is right, 2 is left.

spEffectTextId_1.Wiki: The SpEffect text ID to use.

currentHealthAttackRate.Wiki: The scalar to attack depending on current health.

triggerOnWepType.Wiki: Trigger this SpEffect only if the specified held weapon type is present.

triggerAttachedWeapon.Wiki: Trigger this speffect for only the weapon it is attached to.\n1 for attacking, 2 for guarding

additionalCharacterSkillUse.Wiki: Increase to the number of uses a character skill has.

triggerEffectOnKnockback_unk.AltName: Trigger Effect on Specified Knockback Type
triggerEffectOnKnockback_unk.Wiki: Appears related to the effects that trigger a boost on knockback

weakPointValue.Wiki: Determines duration extension to weak point from Ironeye.

runeDiscountValue.Wiki: Determines the amount of rune discount from merchants.

modifyPlayerLevel.Wiki: Increases/decreases the player's level by the set value.

restageAttackRate.Wiki: Determines amount of damage inflicted by received Restage. Default rate is 0.5

revenantFamily_spEffectId_1.Wiki: Related to the revenant family buff

revenantFamily_spEffectId_2.Wiki: Related to the revenant family buff

revenantFamily_spEffectId_3.Wiki: Related to the revenant family buff

isSubSaUseMultiplayCorrect.Wiki: If set to 0, temporary poise will not apply multiplayer correction.

dispDartDebuffStacks.Wiki: Displays the number of stacks on the Scholar's dart debuff icon.

randomChanceValue.Wiki: The random chance value to use when in conjunction with state info 2121.

necromancyActivationSpEffectId.Wiki: The SpEffect to apply upon activating Revenant's ability, Necromancy.

ultimateArtGaugeChargeRate.Wiki: The rate at which the Ultimate Art gauge is charged on hit.

conditionStamina.Wiki: The effect of this SpEffect will start when stamina is below this specified rate.

poisonDamageRate.Wiki: Correction value used for point damage and %damage of poison.

diseaseDamageRate.Wiki: Correction value used for point damage and %damage of scarlet rot.

rainDamageCorrection.Wiki: Correct the damage amount of the Night's Tide.

weaponTypeDiscovery.Wiki: Weapons of this type show up in class weapon rolls.

heroStatusModifier.Wiki: Apply a Hero status modifier for a specific character.

analyzeAcquire_effectId.Wiki: Additional effect applied when acquiring targets with Analyze

analyzeSelfLevel1_effectId.Wiki: Additional effect applied when targeting self at level 1

analyzeSelfLevel2_effectId.Wiki: Additional effect applied when targeting self at level 2

analyzeSelfLevel3_effectId.Wiki: Additional effect applied when targeting self at level 3

startMagicId.Wiki: The sorcery/incantation to apply to the player's staff/seal primary slot upon expedition start.

applyIdOnKillSp.Wiki: In certain special cases, the original Kill SpEffect ID is disabled and this one is activated instead.

applyIdOnKillSp_old.Wiki: In certain special cases, the original Kill SpEffect ID is disabled and this one is activated instead.
